title: [Silken Mist, Deck]
description: There is a light and pleasant breeze caressing the ship, and the cloudless sky only adds to the delightfulness of the day.  A few crewmembers amble quickly by with purpose, but not without taking the time to greet the passengers with a wide smile and a cheerful wave.

There is a light and pleasant breeze caressing the ship, and the cloudless sky gives an excellent view of the night sky.  A few crewmembers walk slowly by, occasionally stopping to greet a passenger and inquire after their needs before moving on.
